version_description: Various bug fixes and improvements.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

Added support for Screen Sharing.
Improved support for iPhone X.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

Added support for Screen Sharing.
Improved support for iPhone X.
Various bug fixes and improvements.
Various bug fixes and improvements.
Various bug fixes and improvements.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

Update to this version and benefit from these great improvements:

EASIER TO CHAT AND TO MANAGE PARTICIPANTS: The chat and the attendee list are now clearly separated. Simply click the speech bubble in the navigation bar at the bottom and chat privately or with a group. Tap on the attendee icon to manage your meeting attendees.

BUG FIXES: Thank you for your feedback. With your help, we fixed several bugs and improved the app stability. Keep it coming and we will keep it fixing!

Please update to the latest version to benefit from these great improvements:

FULL BAND AUDIO: GoToMeeting is here to help you connect to people across the world. Our mission is to make connecting as easy as possible for you. That is why today, we are happy to announce that GoToMeeting now supports full band audio for your mobile phone or tablet (works on all devices that support full band audio like your Apple Headphones or AirPods).

APP STABILITY: Thank you for your feedback! With your help, we were able to fix several bugs and to improve the overall app stability. If you have severe technical issues, please let us know. We are here to help and support you.

We fixed an issue where the app sometimes crashes when someone is trying to share the screen.

LET US KNOW WHAT YOU THINK - We hope you are enjoying the GoToMeeting Mobile experience. Tell us in the reviews or reach out to our support team.

FREE AS A BIRD – It’s the next best thing to be. Do you want to trial the GoToMeeting experience from your mobile device? Register via our website and enjoy unlimited meetings with a free account (limited to 40 minutes and three attendees).

CALL ME, MAYBE? – Do you want to save some of that precious data of yours? Let us call you directly on your iPhone. It's easy to select via the Audio Settings. Please note: the organiser of the meeting has to activate this feature for the attendees.

WE ALWAYS MAKE IMPROVEMENTS – We hope that you are enjoying the GoToMeeting Mobile experience. Tell us in the reviews or reach out to our support team.

GoToRoom - Have you heard about GoToRoom? GoToRoom is our all-new intelligent room solution. Now, you can use the GoToMeeting app to scan for available rooms nearby and launch meetings from your phone.

Reduced App Size - We have removed a few bits and bytes to make room on your mobile device for your important files or precious photos.
WE ALWAYS MAKE IMPROVEMENTS – We hope that you are enjoying the GoToMeeting Mobile experience. Tell us in the reviews or reach out to our support team.

Improved Hallway Experience - Waiting for the meeting to start? Use the free time to make changes to your join settings.

Quality Improvements - We are always working on improving the performance and reliability of GoToMeeting. Update to this version to benefit from these improvements.

Commuter Mode - Activate the new Commuter Mode feature for up to 80% less data usage and simplified app controls.

Quality Improvements - We are always working on improving the performance and reliability of GoToMeeting. Update to this version to benefit from these improvements.

"Hey Siri, join my next GoToMeeting!" - Synchronize your calendar with the GoToMeeting app to use Siri shortcuts for joining your next meeting. The perfect companion for your meetings on the go.

Quality Improvements - We are always working on improving the performance and reliability of GoToMeeting. Update to this version to benefit from these improvements.

Record your meeting - When starting a GoToMeeting from your phone, you can now record the meeting with just a few taps. Simply start the recording via the menu in the top right corner.

Enhanced Attendee List - Quickly check how many participants are in your meeting without switching to the attendee list.

Continuous Improvements - We made significant improvements to the audio reliability and quality. Update to this version to benefit from these improvements.

Screen Sharing - Sharing your screen has never been easier. We simplified the steps to share your iPad or iPhone screen with other attendees. Now, it only takes two taps.

Continuous Improvements - We made significant improvements to the audio reliability and quality. Update to this version to benefit from these improvements.

Commuter Mode - We updated the Commuter Mode icon and changed it into a car so that it's easier to understand.

Sign-in improvements - GoToMeeting now remembers your sign-in state and asks you less often to verify your account.

GoToMeet.Me - Easy handling of gotomeet.me URLs to quickly launch and join meetings.

Audio Quality - We are constantly investing into creating the best possible experience. Update to this version to benefit from our latest improvements.

Today Widget - Add GoToMeeting as a widget to your iPhone or iPad to see and join upcoming meetings with a single tap. To enter the widget area, simply swipe right over the Home screen, Lock screen, or while you're looking at your notifications.

Quality - We are constantly investing into creating the best possible experience. Update to this version to benefit from our latest improvements.

See all your meetings - Now, you can see all your meetings in the "My Meetings" tab. Even those, where you are only a Co-Organizer.

iPad Update - Enjoy a refreshed iPad user interface now. With clearer buttons and better readability.
